Clojure golf, merge sorted seqs. Your turn.
(defn m[[x & r :as w][y & q :as z]](cond(not y)w(not x)z(> x y)`[~y ~@(m w q)]1`[~x ~@(m z r)]))

Clojure function to answer: Is this an anagram of a palindrome?
 
(defn aop? [s]
  (->> s frequencies vals (filter odd?) count (> 2)))
